localize.text: Face the fear, build the future.
That's the motto of the founder, whom we call 'A.'
Which part of the motto do you prefer?
Face the fear.
Build the future.
We’re the first humans on Earth to discover Abnormalities.
Well, excluding me. I am not human.
How should I put it?
We’re pioneering a whole new world.
The discoveries we have made so far are merely the tip of an iceberg.
Abnormalities were among us since the beginning. We have only recently 'noticed' their presence.
We discovered them.
And had faced fear itself.
They are frighteningly alien in nature.
The future is inevitable, but undecided.
One could just give in to the future,
Or shape it with a purpose.
Lobotomy is an innovative company.
The harvesting technologies we've discovered are such a...
Please excuse my lack of vocabulary.
It's simply remarkable.
These technologies could be the salvation of mankind.
We're molding the future.
It's a special day today.
See the glass of champagne? Let us toast.
Oh, it’s not someone's birthday or my date of manufacture.
You lost an employee for the first time yesterday.
And many more will follow. I am helping you to cope with it.
They knew the risks from the beginning. The company grows on their sacrifices.
I’m sure they would feel proud of themselves in their dying breath.
You should respect them.
That is why we're toasting now.
Cheers for the deceased, to remember their noble sacrifices.
Drink the champagne.
Don’t drink it.
I will give you a tip.
To properly drink a glass of champagne, lightly hold the lower stem of the glass and savor the bubbles.
Yes, just like that.
Are you saving it for later?
Fine, there will be many occasions to toast on.
But manager, please refrain from drinking alone.
To celebrate alone is not a good thing.
